description:
Full frame, full UV protection, and full style points. With their big bold frames and classic green tint, the Carrall have a strong vintage vibe.

  • Fits small to medium faces best
  • Anti-slip nose pads help keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Carrall Sunglasses - Unisex
